Quote.Author: Philip K. Dick
Quote.QuoteValue: The core of my writing is not art but truth

Quote.Author: Philip K. Dick
Quote.QuoteValue: I dreamed: I am the fish whose flesh is eaten, and because I am fat, it is good

Quote.Author: Philip Seymour Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: I know I wasn't as handsome as some other guys, but I was OK with that

Quote.Author: Philip Seymour Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: Life's pretty funny when you're objectively on the outside looking at it

Quote.Author: Philip Seymour Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: One person's religion is another person's cult

Quote.Author: Philip Seymour Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: Creating something is all about problem-solving

Quote.Author: Philip Seymour Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I'm less anonymous than I was

Quote.Author: Philip Seymour Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: No one wants to be pretentious about what they do or take it seriously, because that is just weird

Quote.Author: Philip Seymour Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: You can look at anything as a cult. Churches are cults in their own way

Quote.Author: Philip Seymour Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, I think everyone struggles with self-love

Quote.Author: Philip Seymour Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: People actually live with their id exposed. They're not good at concealing what's going on inside

Quote.Author: Philip Seymour Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: Films are always a fiction, not documentary. Even a documentary is a kind of fiction

Quote.Author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield
Quote.QuoteValue: Our own self-love draws a thick veil between us and our faults

Quote.Author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield
Quote.QuoteValue: In seeking wisdom thou art wise; in imagining that thou hast attained it - thou art a fool

Quote.Author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield
Quote.QuoteValue: An injury is much sooner forgotten than an insult

Quote.Author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield
Quote.QuoteValue: Sex: the pleasure is momentary, the position ridiculous, and the expense damnable

Quote.Author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield
Quote.QuoteValue: Good humor is the health of the soul, sadness is its poison

Quote.Author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield
Quote.QuoteValue: Whoever is in a hurry shows that the thing he is about is too big for him

Quote.Author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield
Quote.QuoteValue: Swift speedy time, feathered with flying hours, Dissolves the beauty of the fairest brow

Quote.Author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield
Quote.QuoteValue: Be wiser than other people if you can, but do not tell them so

Quote.Author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield
Quote.QuoteValue: In those days he was wiser than he is now - he used frequently to take my advice

Quote.Author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield
Quote.QuoteValue: The mere brute pleasure of reading - the sort of pleasure a cow must have in grazing

Quote.Author: Philippe Petit
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the poet of the high wire - I never do stunts; I do theatrical performances

Quote.Author: Philippe Petit
Quote.QuoteValue: Passion is the motto of all my actions

Quote.Author: Philippe Petit
Quote.QuoteValue: In my life, I wanted to meet certain people. I never met Charlie Chaplin, but I met Werner Herzog

Quote.Author: Philippe Petit
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a child inside me that wants to come out and do something to surprise all the adults

Quote.Author: Philippe Petit
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very easy to walk on a wire if you spend a whole lifetime practicing for it

Quote.Author: Philippe Petit
Quote.QuoteValue: My journey has always been the balance between chaos and order

Quote.Author: Philippe Petit
Quote.QuoteValue: I was never part of the sailing circle, but I enjoy when I'm invited to sail

Quote.Author: Philippe Petit
Quote.QuoteValue: Every year, I am conscious of the anniversary of my 1974 World Trade Center walk

Quote.Author: Philippe Petit
Quote.QuoteValue: Usually, when I walk on a wire, I inspect the anchor point on both sides before crossing

Quote.Author: Philippe Petit
Quote.QuoteValue: It is treacherous on a high wire to change your focus point and suddenly look down

Quote.Author: Phillips Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Be patient and understanding. Life is too short to be vengeful or malicious

Quote.Author: Phillips Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Forgive, forget. Bear with the faults of others as you would have them bear with yours

Quote.Author: Phillips Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is the natural flower of duty

Quote.Author: Phillips Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Christianity helps us face the music even when we don't like the tune

Quote.Author: Phillips Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not pray for easy lives. Pray to be stronger men!

Quote.Author: Phillips Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Set yourself earnestly to see what you are made to do, and then set yourself earnestly to do it

Quote.Author: Phillips Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Charity should begin at home, but should not stay there

Quote.Author: Phillips Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Character may be manifested in the great moments, but it is made in the small ones

Quote.Author: Phillips Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: A prayer in its simplest definition is merely a wish turned Godward

Quote.Author: Phillips Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: It does not take great men to do great things; it only takes consecrated men

Quote.Author: Phyllis Diller
Quote.QuoteValue: A smile is a curve that sets everything straight

Quote.Author: Phyllis Diller
Quote.QuoteValue: Burt Reynolds once asked me out. I was in his room

Quote.Author: Phyllis Diller
Quote.QuoteValue: I want my children to have all the things I couldn't afford. Then I want to move in with them

Quote.Author: Phyllis Diller
Quote.QuoteValue: Always be nice to your children because they are the ones who will choose your rest home

Quote.Author: Phyllis Diller
Quote.QuoteValue: Aim high, and you won't shoot your foot off

Quote.Author: Phyllis Diller
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever you may look like, marry a man your own age - as your beauty fades, so will his eyesight

Quote.Author: Phyllis Diller
Quote.QuoteValue: Never go to bed mad. Stay up and fight

Quote.Author: Phyllis Diller
Quote.QuoteValue: A bachelor is a guy who never made the same mistake once

Quote.Author: Phyllis Diller
Quote.QuoteValue: My photographs don't do me justice - they just look like me

Quote.Author: Phyllis Diller
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a good thing that beauty is only skin deep, or I'd be rotten to the core

Quote.Author: Phyllis Schlafly
Quote.QuoteValue: When it comes to determining child custody, however, sexism is the rule

Quote.Author: Phyllis Schlafly
Quote.QuoteValue: Forcing women in or near land combat will hurt recruiting, not help

Quote.Author: Phyllis Schlafly
Quote.QuoteValue: Bite us once, shame on the dog; bite us repeatedly, shame on us for allowing it

Quote.Author: Phyllis Schlafly
Quote.QuoteValue: People think that child-support enforcement benefits children, but it doesn't

Quote.Author: Phyllis Schlafly
Quote.QuoteValue: The European nations' loss of sovereignty to the EU should be a warning to Americans

Quote.Author: Phyllis Schlafly
Quote.QuoteValue: Many professors are Marxists or other varieties of radicals who hate America

Quote.Author: Phyllis Schlafly
Quote.QuoteValue: The worst censors are those prohibiting criticism of the theory of evolution in the classroom

Quote.Author: Phyllis Schlafly
Quote.QuoteValue: How can we protect homeland security unless the government stops the invasion of illegal aliens?

Quote.Author: Phyllis Schlafly
Quote.QuoteValue: In a world of inhumanity, war and terrorism, American citizenship is a very precious possession

Quote.Author: Phyllis Schlafly
Quote.QuoteValue: Birth on U.S. territory has never been an absolute claim to citizenship

Quote.Author: Pico Iyer
Quote.QuoteValue: For centuries, Cuba's greatest resource has been its people

Quote.Author: Pico Iyer
Quote.QuoteValue: The more ways we have to connect, the more many of us seem desperate to unplug

Quote.Author: Pico Iyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Hello Kitty will never speak

Quote.Author: Pico Iyer
Quote.QuoteValue: We have more and more ways to communicate, as Thoreau noted, but less and less to say

Quote.Author: Pico Iyer
Quote.QuoteValue: A holy day, after all, is a day for considering everything you otherwise think too little about

Quote.Author: Pico Iyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Home is, in the end, not just the place where you sleep, but the place where you stand

Quote.Author: Pico Iyer
Quote.QuoteValue: A book doesn't have to be a literary classic, of course, to change us forever

Quote.Author: Pico Iyer
Quote.QuoteValue: American dreams are strongest in the hearts of those who have seen America only in their dreams

Quote.Author: Pico Iyer
Quote.QuoteValue: A writer is a palmist, reading the lines of the planet

Quote.Author: Pico Iyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Certainly, I think Canada is many years ahead of the curve and still the great global pioneer

Quote.Author: Pierce Brosnan
Quote.QuoteValue: My religious philosophy is kindness. Try to be kind. That's something worth achieving

Quote.Author: Pierce Brosnan
Quote.QuoteValue: Oh, humiliation is poisonous. It's one of the deepest pains of being human

Quote.Author: Pierce Brosnan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm one of those guys who believes that you need a strong woman in your life

Quote.Author: Pierce Brosnan
Quote.QuoteValue: No one can escape life's pain. That's life

Quote.Author: Pierce Brosnan
Quote.QuoteValue: I had to have some balls to be Irish Catholic in South London. Most of that time I spent fighting

Quote.Author: Pierce Brosnan
Quote.QuoteValue: James Bond is one of those heroes that all guys feel they could actually be like

Quote.Author: Pierce Brosnan
Quote.QuoteValue: Indian cinema is entertaining, and what I love most about it is the songs and dances in the films

Quote.Author: Pierce Brosnan
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been a married man most of my life; that's the way I like it

Quote.Author: Pierce Brosnan
Quote.QuoteValue: You're always going to have to prove yourself, because acting is such a capricious game

Quote.Author: Pierce Brosnan
Quote.QuoteValue: I realise how precious life is, probably because I've seen how it can be taken away

Quote.Author: Pierre de Coubertin
Quote.QuoteValue: The important thing in life is not to triumph but to compete

Quote.Author: Pierre de Coubertin
Quote.QuoteValue: Sport is the habitual and voluntary cultivation of intensive physical effort

Quote.Author: Pierre de Coubertin
Quote.QuoteValue: Holding an Olympic Games means evoking history

Quote.Author: Pierre de Coubertin
Quote.QuoteValue: Swifter, higher, stronger

Quote.Author: Pierre de Coubertin
Quote.QuoteValue: The Olympic Games are the quadrennial celebration of the springtime of humanity

Quote.Author: Pierre de Coubertin
Quote.QuoteValue: Sport must be accessible to working class youth

Quote.Author: Pierre de Coubertin
Quote.QuoteValue: For each individual, sport is a possible source for inner improvement

Quote.Author: Pierre de Coubertin
Quote.QuoteValue: All sports must be treated on the basis of equality

Quote.Author: Pierre de Coubertin
Quote.QuoteValue: All sports for all people

Quote.Author: Pierre de Coubertin
Quote.QuoteValue: Success comprises in itself the seeds of its own decline and sport is not spared by this law

Quote.Author: Pilou Asbaek
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is not black and white; there is some gray nuance to it

Quote.Author: Pilou Asbaek
Quote.QuoteValue: It's always difficult when you're working with Mother Nature, because you need to adapt to that

Quote.Author: Pilou Asbaek
Quote.QuoteValue: The most exciting thing about joining 'Game Of Thrones' is joining 'Game Of Thrones.'

Quote.Author: Pilou Asbaek
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an actor. 99.9% of all actors in the world have been in denial towards the military

Quote.Author: Pilou Asbaek
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know - the whole leading man, I don't buy it

Quote.Author: Pilou Asbaek
Quote.QuoteValue: As a private person, I am maybe more 'Eurovision' than Kasper Juul

Quote.Author: Pilou Asbaek
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm trying to have a family and a career

Quote.Author: Pilou Asbaek
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a father first

Quote.Author: Pilou Asbaek
Quote.QuoteValue: Films come and go. Families stay

Quote.Author: Pilou Asbaek
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to keep pushing those boundaries of acting

Quote.Author: Pim Fortuyn
Quote.QuoteValue: I say what I think, and I do what I say!

Quote.Author: Pim Fortuyn
Quote.QuoteValue: Muslims have a very bad attitude to homosexuality, they're very intolerant

Quote.Author: Pim Fortuyn
Quote.QuoteValue: What we are witnessing now is a clash of civilisations, not just between states but within them

Quote.Author: Pim Fortuyn
Quote.QuoteValue: All those who are here can stay. I don't say send them home like he does

Quote.Author: Pim Fortuyn
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not anti-Muslim; I'm not anti-immigration

Quote.Author: Pim Fortuyn
Quote.QuoteValue: Le Pen is old; I'm young

Quote.Author: Pim Fortuyn
Quote.QuoteValue: There is tension between the values of modern society and the principles of Islam

Quote.Author: Pim Fortuyn
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no desire to go through the emancipation of women and homosexuals all over again

Quote.Author: Pim Fortuyn
Quote.QuoteValue: Why they vote for me is irrelevant, but if they do, they're in safe hands

Quote.Author: Pim Fortuyn
Quote.QuoteValue: Moroccan boys never steal from Moroccans

Quote.Author: Pink
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom has always wished me a daughter just like me

Quote.Author: Pink
Quote.QuoteValue: When you have a dark side, nothing is ever as good as it seems

Quote.Author: Pink
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I wish I was poetic and subtle. I write very bold and blunt and tell it like it is

Quote.Author: Pink
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the shows that are in dingy little dark clubs, smoky, no production whatsoever

Quote.Author: Pink
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Sexy' doesn't have to come with the price tag of being dumb

Quote.Author: Pink
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learned I'm not lying by not saying anything, so I just don't say it anymore

Quote.Author: Pink
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always felt like the underdog, and I'm comfortable with that label

Quote.Author: Pink
Quote.QuoteValue: I write from my life, my experience. I'm selfish that way

Quote.Author: Pink
Quote.QuoteValue: Cameron Diaz was so cute at the MTV Movie Awards when she pulled her skirt up and wiped her armpits

Quote.Author: Pink
Quote.QuoteValue: I change my mind so much I need two boyfriends and a girlfriend

Quote.Author: Pitbull
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is my hustle

Quote.Author: Pitbull
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm taking all the negatives in my life, and turning them into a positive

Quote.Author: Pitbull
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm in the major league now

Quote.Author: Pitbull
Quote.QuoteValue: My owner is life and that's what I fight for

Quote.Author: Pitbull
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm here to entertain

Quote.Author: Pitbull
Quote.QuoteValue: I look at this game from a different perspective

Quote.Author: Pitbull
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to keep my money at the end of the day

Quote.Author: Pitbull
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't get much whiter than me

Quote.Author: Pitbull
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm taking a lot of freestyle music and flipping it

Quote.Author: Pitbull
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm no longer an artist, I'm a business partner

Quote.Author: Plautus
Quote.QuoteValue: Let us celebrate the occasion with wine and sweet words

Quote.Author: Plautus
Quote.QuoteValue: He who seeks for gain, must be at some expense

Quote.Author: Plautus
Quote.QuoteValue: No blessing lasts forever

Quote.Author: Plautus
Quote.QuoteValue: Things we do not expect, happen more frequently than we wish

Quote.Author: Plautus
Quote.QuoteValue: The poor man who enters into a partnership with one who is rich makes a risky venture

Quote.Author: Plautus
Quote.QuoteValue: A mouse does not rely on just one hole

Quote.Author: Plautus
Quote.QuoteValue: Conquered, we conquer

Quote.Author: Plautus
Quote.QuoteValue: Where there are friends there is wealth

Quote.Author: Plautus
Quote.QuoteValue: Good courage in a bad affair is half of the evil overcome

Quote.Author: Plautus
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have overcome your inclination and not been overcome by it, you have reason to rejoice

Quote.Author: Pliny the Elder
Quote.QuoteValue: Home is where the heart is

Quote.Author: Pliny the Elder
Quote.QuoteValue: Hope is the pillar that holds up the world. Hope is the dream of a waking man

Quote.Author: Pliny the Elder
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth comes out in wine

Quote.Author: Pliny the Elder
Quote.QuoteValue: An object in possession seldom retains the same charm that it had in pursuit

Quote.Author: Pliny the Elder
Quote.QuoteValue: In these matters the only certainty is that nothing is certain

Quote.Author: Pliny the Elder
Quote.QuoteValue: From the end spring new beginnings

Quote.Author: Pliny the Elder
Quote.QuoteValue: No mortal man, moreover is wise at all moments

Quote.Author: Pliny the Elder
Quote.QuoteValue: The best plan is to profit by the folly of others

Quote.Author: Pliny the Elder
Quote.QuoteValue: There is always something new out of Africa

Quote.Author: Pliny the Elder
Quote.QuoteValue: The only certainty is that nothing is certain

Quote.Author: Plutarch
Quote.QuoteValue: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality

Quote.Author: Plutarch
Quote.QuoteValue: To find fault is easy; to do better may be difficult

Quote.Author: Plutarch
Quote.QuoteValue: The mind is not a vessel to be filled but a fire to be kindled

Quote.Author: Plutarch
Quote.QuoteValue: The very spring and root of honesty and virtue lie in good education

Quote.Author: Plutarch
Quote.QuoteValue: The omission of good is no less reprehensible than the commission of evil

Quote.Author: Plutarch
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who aim at great deeds must also suffer greatly

Quote.Author: Plutarch
Quote.QuoteValue: Know how to listen, and you will profit even from those who talk badly

Quote.Author: Plutarch
Quote.QuoteValue: The wildest colts make the best horses

Quote.Author: Plutarch
Quote.QuoteValue: Neither blame or praise yourself

Quote.Author: Plutarch
Quote.QuoteValue: In words are seen the state of mind and character and disposition of the speaker

Quote.Author: Pope Benedict XVI
Quote.QuoteValue: The church is not a political power; it's not a party, but it's a moral power

Quote.Author: Pope Benedict XVI
Quote.QuoteValue: True friends challenge us and help us to be faithful on our journey

Quote.Author: Pope Benedict XVI
Quote.QuoteValue: An Adult faith does not follow the waves of fashion and the latest novelties

Quote.Author: Pope Benedict XVI
Quote.QuoteValue: I too hope in this short reign to be a man of peace

Quote.Author: Pope Benedict XVI
Quote.QuoteValue: We were looking for a 'good shepherd', and instead we got a German shepherd

Quote.Author: Pope Benedict XVI
Quote.QuoteValue: The outpouring of Christ's blood is the source of the church's life

Quote.Author: Pope Benedict XVI
Quote.QuoteValue: Our Earth is talking to us, and we must listen to it and decipher its message if we want to survive

Quote.Author: Pope Benedict XVI
Quote.QuoteValue: We all see that, today, man can destroy the foundation of his existence: his Earth

Quote.Author: Pope Benedict XVI
Quote.QuoteValue: The truth touches us. We try to be guided by this contact

Quote.Author: Pope Benedict XVI
Quote.QuoteValue: We need Grace and forgiveness

Quote.Author: Pope John XXIII
Quote.QuoteValue: It is easier for a father to have children than for children to have a real father

Quote.Author: Pope John XXIII
Quote.QuoteValue: I have looked into your eyes with my eyes. I have put my heart near your heart

Quote.Author: Pope John XXIII
Quote.QuoteValue: The true and solid peace of nations consists not in equality of arms, but in mutual trust alone

Quote.Author: Pope John XXIII
Quote.QuoteValue: See everything, overlook a great deal, correct a little

Quote.Author: Pope John XXIII
Quote.QuoteValue: A peaceful man does more good than a learned one

Quote.Author: Pope John XXIII
Quote.QuoteValue: The family is the first essential cell of human society

Quote.Author: Pope John XXIII
Quote.QuoteValue: The feelings of my smallness and my nothingness always kept me good company

Quote.Author: Pope John XXIII
Quote.QuoteValue: Born poor, but of honored and humble people, I am particularly proud to die poor

Quote.Author: Pope John XXIII
Quote.QuoteValue: Here I am at the end of the road and at the top of the heap

Quote.Author: Pope John XXIII
Quote.QuoteValue: Every man has the right to life, to bodily integrity

Quote.Author: Pope Paul VI
Quote.QuoteValue: Of all human activities, man's listening to God is the supreme act of his reasoning and will

Quote.Author: Pope Paul VI
Quote.QuoteValue: In youth the days are short and the years are long. In old age the years are short and day's long

Quote.Author: Pope Paul VI
Quote.QuoteValue: Never reach out your hand unless you're willing to extend an arm

Quote.Author: Pope Paul VI
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing makes one feel so strong as a call for help

Quote.Author: Pope Paul VI
Quote.QuoteValue: Anger is as a stone cast into a wasp's nest

Quote.Author: Pope Paul VI
Quote.QuoteValue: A dimple on the chin, the devil within

Quote.Author: Pope Paul VI
Quote.QuoteValue: Think how many blameless lives are brightened by the blazing indiscretions of other people

Quote.Author: Pope Paul VI
Quote.QuoteValue: Are there memories left that are safe from the clutches of phony anniversaries?

Quote.Author: Pope Paul VI
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want peace work for justice

Quote.Author: Pope Paul VI
Quote.QuoteValue: The older the fiddler, the sweeter the tune

Quote.Author: Poppy Delevingne
Quote.QuoteValue: You could say I'm a bit of a nomad

Quote.Author: Poppy Delevingne
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm more of a handbag girl; my guilty pleasure is bags. I don't even have a clue how many I own

Quote.Author: Poppy Delevingne
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not used to going out every single night, which you can do in New York

Quote.Author: Poppy Delevingne
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to shut out the world sometimes and hibernate

Quote.Author: Poppy Delevingne
Quote.QuoteValue: I love maxi dresses, I feel so great when I put on a maxi dress, big earrings and sandals

Quote.Author: Poppy Delevingne
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always late for things and always feel like I'm rushing

Quote.Author: Poppy Delevingne
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother is the bravest human being I've ever come across

Quote.Author: Poppy Delevingne
Quote.QuoteValue: Choupette literally has the finest tuna, the finest of everything a cat could ever have

Quote.Author: Poppy Delevingne
Quote.QuoteValue: All I ever wanted was to be a sexy bride, and actually, I think I've turned into a romantic bride

Quote.Author: Poppy Delevingne
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm bonkers about juicing. I got into it when I lived in L.A. - I'd juice three times a day

Quote.Author: Portia de Rossi
Quote.QuoteValue: My sexuality is a part of me that I really like. But it's not the totality of me

Quote.Author: Portia de Rossi
Quote.QuoteValue: It sounds so trite, but my private life is mine

Quote.Author: Portia de Rossi
Quote.QuoteValue: We must be able to inspire. That's my goal in acting

Quote.Author: Portia de Rossi
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to be feminine, yet intellectual and smart at the same time. You don't see enough of that

Quote.Author: Portia de Rossi
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't even like watching sex scenes in movies. I have a slight prudish side to me

Quote.Author: Portia de Rossi
Quote.QuoteValue: Supermodels are over, and the new picture girl has become the television actress

Quote.Author: Portia de Rossi
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to exude strength and intelligence

Quote.Author: Portia de Rossi
Quote.QuoteValue: People might find me attractive, but it's also my job to prove that I can be intelligent

Quote.Author: Portia de Rossi
Quote.QuoteValue: I justified it in so many ways. I had a very, very long and difficult struggle with my sexuality

Quote.Author: Portia de Rossi
Quote.QuoteValue: I thought, I'm out in my life, that doesn't involve my public life

Quote.Author: Prince Charles
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing like a jolly good disaster to get people to start doing something

Quote.Author: Prince Charles
Quote.QuoteValue: Your greatest achievement is to love me

Quote.Author: Prince Charles
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather go by bus

Quote.Author: Prince Charles
Quote.QuoteValue: Do you seriously expect me to be the first Prince of Wales in history not to have a mistress?

Quote.Author: Prince Charles
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned the way a monkey learns - by watching its parents

Quote.Author: Prince Charles
Quote.QuoteValue: Hong Kong has created one of the most successful societies on Earth

Quote.Author: Prince Charles
Quote.QuoteValue: I sometimes wonder if two thirds of the globe is covered in red carpet

Quote.Author: Prince Charles
Quote.QuoteValue: All the time I feel I must justify my existence

Quote.Author: Prince Charles
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe passionately that everyone has a particular God-given ability

Quote.Author: Prince Charles
Quote.QuoteValue: We would never comment on private correspondence

Quote.Author: Prince Royce
Quote.QuoteValue: At 17, I was working at Sprint in the Bronx so I could make money to fund my own music

Quote.Author: Prince Royce
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything in life is a risk! I mean, you walk out onto the street and it's a risk! Don't you think?

Quote.Author: Prince Royce
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not here to try and replace anyone or compete with anyone

Quote.Author: Prince Royce
Quote.QuoteValue: I think when you translate songs, you lose the real essence and the meaning

Quote.Author: Prince Royce
Quote.QuoteValue: Media always comments if I wear the same thing twice

Quote.Author: Prince Royce
Quote.QuoteValue: I would definitely love to work with somebody like Jay Z or Rihanna

Quote.Author: Prince Royce
Quote.QuoteValue: My dream girl... well, I love eyes. And lips. She has to have nice lips!

Quote.Author: Prince Royce
Quote.QuoteValue: Girls love emotion

Quote.Author: Prince Royce
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I collaborate with an artist, I want to surprise fans. I want to do something new

Quote.Author: Prince Royce
Quote.QuoteValue: I go skydiving often. At least twice a year

Quote.Author: Priyanka Chopra
Quote.QuoteValue: Any transition is easier if you believe in yourself and your talent

Quote.Author: Priyanka Chopra
Quote.QuoteValue: I live with romance in my brain. I'm a true-blue Cancerian like that

Quote.Author: Priyanka Chopra
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't try to squeeze into a glass slipper. Instead, shatter the glass ceiling

Quote.Author: Priyanka Chopra
Quote.QuoteValue: People keep speculating about my personal life because I am evasive about it

Quote.Author: Priyanka Chopra
Quote.QuoteValue: My ambition when I was four years old was to be married

Quote.Author: Priyanka Chopra
Quote.QuoteValue: I live cinema and passionately love music, and my efforts in both these crafts are unfolding

Quote.Author: Priyanka Chopra
Quote.QuoteValue: I love dabbling in different genres, and I like being good at different genres of cinema

Quote.Author: Priyanka Chopra
Quote.QuoteValue: I never had any awkward situations with Shah Rukh

Quote.Author: Priyanka Chopra
Quote.QuoteValue: You can be an absolute woman and also be smart and tough and not lose your femininity

Quote.Author: Priyanka Chopra
Quote.QuoteValue: I can never be incognito... but I love it!

Quote.Author: Psy
Quote.QuoteValue: The world's most famous and popular language is music

Quote.Author: Psy
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not that good looking

Quote.Author: Psy
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything moves way too fast

Quote.Author: Psy
Quote.QuoteValue: I never expect I would become a K-pop star

Quote.Author: Psy
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to dress classy and dance cheesy

Quote.Author: Psy
Quote.QuoteValue: I just made my album. I did my best. And I uploaded the video just to 'YouTube.' That was all

Quote.Author: Psy
Quote.QuoteValue: Before 'Gangnam Style' I was not a good attitude artist

Quote.Author: Psy
Quote.QuoteValue: I need to show the world that my final goal is to perform huge concerts like Madonna
